segments.text: Good morning , Mr Zhang , I wonder whether you have got an answer from your superior .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , we had a meting about it yesterday afternoon .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We decided that we could agree to your price , but we are a bit worried about the slow delivery .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me see . I quoted your delivery in three months , didn't I ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , but we hope that the wool could reach us as soon as possible .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I thought you would be worried about it . So I rang Auckland last night . As you are our biggest customer , they agreed to ship the order on the first vessel available that will leave Auckland next month .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good , if you agree we'll draft the agreement right away and sign it then .
segments.speaker: S2
